          <title>
            <string language="es">Superficies esféricas como superficies de revolución</string>
            <string language="en">Spherical surfaces as surfaces of revolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugelförmige Oberflächen als Oberflächen der 
Umdrehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Surfaces sphériques comme surfaces de 
révolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superfícies esféricas como superfícies da 
volta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Superfici sferiche come superfici del giro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφαιρικές επιφάνειες ως επιφάνειες της επανάστασης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que muestra cómo se pueden obtener superficies esféricas mediante la revolución de regiones planas</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which shows how spherical surfaces can be obtained from the revolution of plane areas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sector</string>
            <string language="en">sector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">huso</string>
            <string language="en">lune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">semiesfera</string>
            <string language="en">hemisphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tridimensional</string>
            <string language="en">three-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die zeigt, wie 
kugelförmige Oberflächen von der Umdrehung der flachen Bereiche 
erhalten werden können</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui montre comment des 
surfaces sphériques peuvent être obtenues à partir de la 
révolution des zones plates</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que mostra como as 
superfícies esféricas podem ser obtidas da volta de áreas planas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che mostra come le 
superfici sferiche possono essere ottenute dalla rivoluzione delle 
zone piane</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιδεικνύει πώς οι 
σφαιρικές επιφάνειες μπορούν να ληφθούν από την επανάσταση των 
περιοχών αεροπλάνων</string>
          </description>
